name: Official Sentry Brand Colors
description: Complete collection of Sentry's official brand colors

usage.primary: Main brand identity colors - use for primary UI elements and branding
usage.secondary: Accent colors - use for highlights, CTAs, and important elements
usage.tertiary: Supporting colors - use for success states, info, and variety
usage.digital: Colors marked 'for digital only' - optimized for screens, not print

notes: Darker colors (#36166B, #4D0A55, #181225) work well on light backgrounds
Brighter colors (#7553FF, #9E86FF, #FF45A8) work well on dark backgrounds
Always test color combinations for WCAG AA compliance
